awards.title: Second Prize in APMCM Mathematical Modeling Competition
awards.awarder: Beijing Society of Image and Graphics, APMCM Organizing Committee
awards.summary: Topic: Construction of Ecological Conservation and Evaluation of Its Impact on Environment Based on Ecological Protection Model and Neural Network.

awards.title: Provincial First Prize in China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling
awards.awarder: China Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
awards.summary: Topic: Research on Raw Material Procurement and Transportation Plans for a Specified Manufacturing Enterprise Based on a Dynamic Programming Model.
